paytp.not-enough: You don't have enough %s! The teleportation fee is %s %s but you only have %s.
paytp.requester-not-enough: The other player does not have enough money to teleport.
paytp.no-home: You have not set a home yet.
paytp.set-home: Successfully set your current location as your %s!
paytp.receive:
Player %s wants to teleport to you... The request will expire in %s seconds.
Please select:
paytp.help:
==============================================
============== PayTp Command Help ==============
Below are all commands provided by this plugin:

[Teleportation]
    %s <x> <y> <z>
        - Teleport to the specified coordinates

    %s <dimension> <x> <y> <z>
        - Teleport to the specified dimension and coordinates

    %s <player>
        - Request to teleport to a target player

[Request Control]
    %s
        - Accept the most recent teleport request

    %s
        - Cancel or deny the teleport request

[Home System]
    %s
        - Return to your set home

    %s
        - Set your current position as home

==============================================
Note: All teleportations cost currency based on distance and cross-dimension travel.
